Title: Men’s Dreyfuss & Co. 1925 Reserve De Marche automatic watch DGS00113/04
Description: chapelle_jewellery Visit our eBay Shop Add us to your Favourites list > Subscribe to our Newsletter > About Chapelle Delivery The Chapelle Guarantee Men’s Dreyfuss & Co. 1925 Reserve De Marche automatic watch DGS00113/04 RRP £1,750.00 Now £875.00 Description Part of the 1925 Reserve De Marche collection, this elegant men’s analogue watch from Dreyfuss & Co. has a sleek, classic design. Crafted in strong stainless steel and featuring warming rose gold plated details, all elements of the watch design work together to create an essential design ideal for day to evening wear. The stainless steel watch casing is round in shape, measuring 45mm in width and 13mm in depth. Plated in rose gold, the a fixed bezel frames the detailed dial, protected by a layer of sapphire crystal glass. The dial itself has a multi-tonal colour scheme, edged with a black and white minute track and drawing the eye with a central champagne section. Rose gold tone batons indicate the hours, with a smaller subdial beneath twelve showing the charge level of the watch. The recognisable Dreyfuss & Co. logo is positioned at six, along with a rose gold tone edged date window. Worn with a black croc-effect leather strap, the dark complementing colour scheme makes this watch ideal for formal occasions. The strap is fastened with a rose gold tone press buckle and the inner workings of this watch are impervious to water, meeting Dreyfuss & Co’s Seafarer Standard. On the rear of the stainless steel watch case, a skeleton cutaway displays the intricate inner mechanics of the watch. As Chapelle are authorised stockists of Dreyfuss & Co. watches, this watch will be sent brand new in an attractive wooden presentation box and with a two year manufacturer’s warranty. Chapelle reference: 08460085 Other Brands we stock About Chapelle Chapelle Jewellery is a family run business offering jewellery and watches with discounts of up to 50% off RRP. We purchase at the best possible prices and pass on these savings to our customers. All our items are new and perfect goods; we do not sell seconds or second-hand items. We are authorised stockists of all the brands we sell so you can be confident you're buying from a reputable company. Delivery Orders dispatched within the UK will be sent using Royal Mail Recorded Signed For first class. Orders being sent to international destinations will be sent by Royal Mail International Signed For delivery. Visit our ebay store for our full range >>
